data.enText: a substance that is put into the blood and that protects the body from a disease

data.chText: 现在还没有防艾滋病病毒传染的疫苗。
data.enText: There is no vaccine against HIV infection.

tr: immunogen consisting of a suspension of weakened or dead pathogenic cells injected in order to stimulate the production of antibodies

value.def: A vaccine is a substance containing a harmless form of the germs that cause a particular disease. It is given to people, usually by injection, to prevent them getting that disease.

example.ex: Anti-malarial vaccines are now undergoing trials...
example.tran: 抗疟疾的疫苗正在试验阶段。

example.ex: Seven million doses of vaccine are annually given to British children.
example.tran: 英国孩子每年要接种7百万剂疫苗。
